recipe.ingredients: - chicken breast (cut into cubes): 2 pounds - zucchini (sliced into rounds): 2 medium - yellow bell peppers (cut into chunks): 2 - red onions (cut into chunks): 2 - cherry tomatoes: 1 cup - olive oil: 3 tablespoons - lemon juice: 3 tablespoons - garlic (minced): 2 cloves - dried oregano: 1 teaspoon - dried basil: 1 teaspoon - salt: 1/2 teaspoon - black pepper: 1/2 teaspoon - wooden or metal skewers: 8-10
recipe.directions: 1. Marinade Preparation: In a large bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, minced garlic, oregano, basil, salt, and black pepper. 2. Marinate Chicken: Add chicken cubes into the marinade. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 1 hour, or overnight for better flavor absorption. 3. Preheat Grill: Preheat your grill to medium-high heat. 4. Assemble Kabobs: Thread marinated chicken, zucchini, yellow bell peppers, red onions, and cherry tomatoes alternately onto skewers. 5. Grill Kabobs: Place the skewers on the grill. Cook for about 10-12 minutes, turning occasionally, until the chicken is thoroughly cooked and the vegetables are tender. 6. Serving: Serve the kabobs hot, optionally with whole-grain rice or a salad.
recipe.nutrition: Total Carbohydrate: 10g, Dietary Fiber: 3g, Sodium: 350mg, Saturated Fat: 2g, Total Fat: 10g, Protein: 35g, Added Sugars: 0g, Total Sugars: 4g
recipe.total_calories_estimation: - Total Calories for entire recipe : Approximately 1840 calories for the entire recipe. - Calories for each ingredient: Chicken Breast: 1106 calories for 2 pounds Zucchini: 66 calories for 2 medium Yellow Bell Peppers: 102 calories for 2 Red Onions: 96 calories for 2 Cherry Tomatoes: 27 calories for 1 cup Olive Oil: 358 calories for 3 tablespoons Lemon Juice: 12 calories for 3 tablespoons Garlic, Oregano, Basil, Salt, Black Pepper: Negligible - Serving People: 4
